check-email: Check your email for a verification link
no-user-sign-up: No user found with your email. Please sign up to continue.

next-auth.Configuration: There seems to be a problem with the server configuration. Please ensure all options are correctly set.
next-auth.AccessDenied: Access denied. You may have restricted access through the sign-in or redirect callback.
next-auth.Verification: Verification issue. The email token has expired or has already been used. Please request a new token.
next-auth.OAuthSignin: There was an error constructing the authorization URL. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
next-auth.OAuthCallback: There was an error handling the response from the OAuth provider. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
next-auth.OAuthCreateAccount: We couldn't create an account with the OAuth provider. Please try again or use a different sign-in method.
next-auth.EmailCreateAccount: There was an issue creating an account with your email. Please try again or use a different email address.
next-auth.Callback: There was an error in the OAuth callback handler route. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
next-auth.OAuthAccountNotLinked: The email on the account is already linked with a different OAuth provider. Please use the linked provider to sign in.
next-auth.EmailSignin: There was an issue sending the email with the verification token. Please try again later.
next-auth.CredentialsSignin: Sign-in failed. Please check your credentials and try again. For security reasons, we can't specify which part of the credentials was incorrect.
next-auth.SessionRequired: You must be signed in to view this content. Please sign in to continue.
next-auth.Default: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
